Column name or attribute of the object type column

Note:

If you create an index on a user-defined REF column, the system creates the index on the attributes that make up the REF column. Therefore, the column names displayed in this view are the attribute names, with the REF column name as a prefix, in the following form: 
"REF_name"."attribute"
Position of the column or attribute within the index
Indicates whether the column is sorted in descending order (DESC) or ascending order (ASC)
